meanings.sent1: The oversouls of the gods were believed to watch over the world.
meanings.sent2: Many people believe in the existence of oversouls that guide and protect them.
meanings.sent3: The oversouls gathered for a meeting to discuss the fate of humanity.
meanings.sent4: Her wisdom and kindness made her seem like an oversoul to those around her.
meanings.sent5: The oversouls were said to shine with a radiant light, illuminating the darkness.

meanings.definition: A transcendent or universal soul that unites all individual souls.
meanings.sent1: The concept of oversouls suggests that we are all connected on a deeper level.
meanings.sent2: In some spiritual beliefs, oversouls are seen as the source of all life and consciousness.
meanings.sent3: The oversouls threw a party to celebrate the harmony among all beings.
meanings.sent4: The idea of oversouls can be compared to a vast ocean where each soul is a drop of water.
meanings.sent5: When meditating, she felt a sense of oneness with the oversouls of the universe.
